resources.string: Please adjust the next audio tracks to your preferred volume.
Press \"Next\" when you are ready to proceed to part I/II
You will soon begin part I/II

string.name: intro_ready
string.u: Note: Once you press \"Next\", you will not be able to return and correct your selection.

resources.string: You can have a %d minutes break
Thank you for completing part I/II :‑)️

• Your task is to adjust the volume of the second track twice:
  • As long as you don\'t press the \"NEXT\" button, you may refine your selection.
\u25CF You will be listening to one audio track and after a few seconds, a second track will play, simultaneously with the first one
\u25CF Your task is to adjust the volume of the second track twice:
\u25CF In the 1st adjustment, please adjust the volume so that the interference of the 2nd track is reasonable or ACCEPTABLE.
\u25CF In the 2nd adjustment, please adjust the volume of the 2nd track so that your listening experience of the 1st track is GREAT:
\u25CF As long as you don\'t press the \"NEXT\" button, you may refine your selection.
